bibdata.title: Draft Standard for Signal and Test Definition
Draft Standard for Signal and Test Definition
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1641/D3, Sept 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides the means to define and describe signals used in testing. It also provides a set of common basic signals, mathematically underpinned so that signals can be combined to form complex signals usable across all test platforms.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
